Noob Scroll

A lightweight jQuery Plugin that adds some cool function to make scrolling more fun.

Made by @arthur_guiot

Simple

NoobScroll is design for noobs (just kidding üòÇ), that's why it's incredibly simple to use üòâ!

Lightweight

NoobScroll is complitely optimized for modern browser and is weight Xkb unminified!

Simply the best

NoobScroll is the only library that combines multiples useful functions about scrolling, but with the ease to use of jQuery.
